name: Chess Pills
description:
Chess Pills is a quick-paced chess puzzle game where you have to guess the right move in a very short time.

PILLS to the rescue

Fortunately, you have your pills to aid you:

  • Orange Pill: You get sharp. You immediately focus on the right piece to move. Now it's up to you to guess where the piece goes.


  • Turquoise Pill: You calm down. The time now passes slowly. You can take your time to figure out what to do. But only before the effect runs out.

Constant Challenge

The puzzles get more difficult as you survive.

Lots of Puzzles

More than 3000 puzzles, always displayed in a different order. Each run is a different run.
